title: In all occupancies except those included in Sr
clause_text: In all occupancies except those included in Sr. No. 1(d) & (e) in the table above, any height in excess of 4.2 m shall be deemed to have consumed an additional F.S.I. of 50% of the relevant floor area.

source_pdf.text_snippet: In all occupancies except those included in Sr. No. 1(d) & (e) in the table above, any height in excess of 4.2 m shall be deemed to have consumed an additional F.S.I. of 50% of the relevant floor area
